nodes.text: Coruscant Nights was a source of entertainment on the planet Coruscant during the Clone Wars. The musician known as Max Rebo was part of it. Posters were put up around Galactic City in order to promote Coruscant Nights.

There were at least two two different poster designs: One showed white text on a dark background and read "Max Reebo [sic]" – "Coruscant Nights". The other poster showed the silhouette of two people against a blue background, and simply said "Coruscant Nights". Fifteen years after the Clone Wars ended, the first poster was used to decorate the walls of the Ghost.
